meanings.sent1: The nonaccrual account did not earn any extra money.
meanings.sent2: The bank marked the nonaccrual loan as not generating profit.
meanings.sent3: The nonaccrual savings account was like a piggy bank with a hole in it.
meanings.sent4: Her nonaccrual investment was a stagnant pond, not growing at all.
meanings.sent5: The nonaccrual assets were like a barren field, yielding no returns.

meanings.definition: Not accumulating or increasing over time.
meanings.sent1: The nonaccrual snow on the mountain stayed the same for weeks.
meanings.sent2: The nonaccrual pile of laundry in the corner seemed to never diminish.
meanings.sent3: His nonaccrual collection of baseball cards was frozen in time.
meanings.sent4: The nonaccrual traffic jam was a never-ending sea of cars.
meanings.sent5: The nonaccrual stack of papers on her desk grew taller but never changed.
